name: Er Ah Flight School
about: ERAH Aviation Academy, located in Isparta, Turkey, has been a pinnacle of pilot training since its founding in 1991. Initially established for pesticide and fire extinguishing services, the academy transitioned to flight training in 2008 to meet the growing demand for qualified pilots. With facilities at Isparta Süleyman Demirel Airport and theoretical training in Antalya and Istanbul, ERAH offers comprehensive programs including theoretical, flight, and simulator training. The academy boasts over 20 training aircraft, modern facilities, and the latest technology simulators. Benefiting from Turkey's favorable flying conditions, allowing for 320 flying days a year, ERAH is committed to providing high-quality aviation education, making it a trusted institution for aspiring pilots. ERAH continues to pride itself on shaping the future of aviation with its experienced instructors and state-of-the-art resources.
